name: Goat in The Cave
description:
The little goat was walking lightly along the green hills, chewing on the grass and enjoying life. Suddenly he came upon the entrance to the cave. Curiosity prevailed and the goat decided to look inside the cave. But as soon as he was inside, something rumbled. The goat turned around and saw that the entrance was flooded. He had no choice but to go looking for an exit from the cave.

Will you help the goat in this adventure?

They are waiting for you: - 2D platformer - Beautiful graphics and animation - Interesting and dangerous levels - Calm relaxing music
